name: DeResolution
description:
BANG...You awake to find yourself in a foreign place called the BIT-GRID. Explore, fight, and throw your digital vorpal frisbee to escape this digital landscape.



Collect bit-energy to progress and escape DERESOLUTION!



Features
  • Third-Person Action
  • Short ( 1-2hours long )
  • Throw your vorpal frisbee and slay your enemies!
  • Unlock up to 4 different weapons
  • Rogue-like / procedural level generation
